LandingPage_mainHeading: Apne Safar ko Taqat Dein. Ek Saath.
LandingPage_subHeading: FEMMORA khawateen ke liye jurrne, apni baat kehne, aur aage barhne ki ek panahgah hai. Apne liye banayi gayi is jagah par, apni behtari, takhleeqi salahiyat, aur community ko explore karein.
LandingPage_thriveParagraph: FEMMORA mein, hum sabki mil kar kaam karne ki taqat par yaqeen rakhte hain. Hamara platform sirf ek app nahi hai; yeh har aurat ki behtari aur kamyabi ke anokhe safar ka jashn manane aur uski himayat karne ke liye ek tehreek hai.
LandingPage_featuresHeading: Khaas Aapke Liye Banaye Gaye Features
LandingPage_featuresSubHeading: Aapko apni zaati aur peshawarana taraqqi ke liye jo kuch bhi chahiye, sab ek jagah par.
LandingPage_featureSoulSpaceTitle: SoulSpace: Aapka Jazbati Sehat ka Saathi
LandingPage_featureSoulSpaceDescription: Ek mehfooz digital panahgah jahan aapke jazbaat ko hamdardi se samjha jaata hai. Chahe aap pareshan hon, kuch soch rahi hon, ya behtar mehsoos kar rahi hon, SoulSpace aapki sunta hai - aapko rehnumai, narm isharay, aur aise AI sathi deta hai jo aapke dil ki zaban bolte hain.
LandingPage_featureHerHealthDescription: Apne cycles, neend aur zehni dabao ko ek pursukoon jagah par track karein. HerHealth aapko samajhne ke liye smart AI ka istemal karta hai - aapke jism ki taal ka khayal rakhte hue, lifestyle mein tabdeeliyan, reminders, aur madadgar routines tajweez karta hai.
LandingPage_featureNourishTitle: Nourish: Aapke Liye Makhsoos Ghiza aur Diet ka Guide
LandingPage_featureNourishDescription: Har aurat ke safar ke liye banaya gaya - taqat se lekar apni dekhbhal tak. Nourish aapke mood, sehat ke maqasid aur culture ke mutabiq khane ki tajaveez deta hai. Har sifarish mohabbat se di jaati hai, pabandi se nahi.
LandingPage_featureEvolveTitle: Evolve: Halki Phulki Fitness aur Tawanai ka Bahao
LandingPage_featureEvolveDescription: Apni raftaar se chalein - yoga, mindful harkat, aur khawateen ke liye makhsoos warzishein jo aapki tawanai aur jazbati halat ke mutabiq hon. Evolve mein har harkat is baat ka jashn hai ke aapka jism kya kar sakta hai, na ke usey kya karna chahiye.
LandingPage_featureCircleDescription: Khawateen ke liye ek doosre se judne, kahaniyan share karne, aur ek doosre ko himmat dene ke liye ek khoobsurat moderate ki gayi jagah. Rozana check-in se lekar takhleeqi challenges tak, Circle baghair muqable ke ittehad ka jashn manata hai - taqat ki ek digital behnchara.
LandingPage_featureFEMMindTitle: FEMMind: Aapka AI-Guided Taraqqi ka Partner
LandingPage_featureFEMMindDescription: Teen behtareen-tuned, hamdard LLMs - Sehat, Jazbati Sehat, aur Zindagi ki Rehnumai ke liye. Woh sirf jawab nahi dete - woh samajhte hain, science ko hamdardi ke sath mila kar aisa mashwara dete hain jo aapko behtar banata hai, na ke sirf hidayat deta hai.
AppShell_toast_logoutSuccess_description: Aap kamyabi se logout ho gaye hain.
AppShell_toast_logoutError_description: Aap ko logout nahi kiya ja saka. Barah-e-karam dobara koshish karein.
AppLayout_loading: Aapki jagah load ho rahi hai...
LoginPage_description: FEMMORA ke sath apna safar jari rakhne ke liye login karein.
LoginPage_toast_error_description: Aapka dakhil karda email ya password ghalat hai. Barah-e-karam apni credentials check karein aur dobara koshish karein.
SignupPage_description: Apna account banayein aur apne aap ko taqatwar banane ka safar shuru karein.
SignupPage_toast_success_description: FEMMORA mein khush aamdeed! Humein bohat khushi hai ke aap yahan hain ðŸ’œ
SignupPage_toast_error_description: Aapka account banane mein koi masla hua. Barah-e-karam dobara koshish karein.
SignupPage_toast_error_emailInUse: Yeh email pehle se istemal mein hai. Barah-e-karam iske bajaye login karein.
FeedPage_postPlaceholder: Aapke zehen mein kya hai, Jane?
ProfilePage_postsTabContent: User ke posts yahan dikhaye jayenge.
ProfilePage_projectsTabContent: User ke projects yahan dikhaye jayenge.
ProfilePage_profileLoadError: User profile load nahi ho saki. Ho sakta hai ke yeh abhi tak mojood na ho.
EditProfileDialog_description: Apni profile mein tabdeeliyan yahan karein. Jab ho jaye to save par click karein.
EditProfileDialog_bioPlaceholder: Humein apne baray mein kuch batayein
EditProfileDialog_toast_avatarError_desc: Aapka naya avatar upload karne mein masla hua. Barah-e-karam dobara koshish karein.
EditProfileDialog_toast_profileSuccess_d: Aapki tabdeeliyan kamyabi se save ho gayi hain.
EditProfileDialog_toast_profileError_des: Aapki profile save karne mein masla hua. Barah-e-karam dobara koshish karein.
ChatInterface_placeholders_health: Jaise, Main ghar par ek aasan warzish ka routine kaise shuru kar sakti hoon?
ChatInterface_placeholders_emotionalWell: Jaise, Main stress mehsoos kar rahi hoon, koi fori mindfulness tips?
ChatInterface_placeholders_nutrition: Jaise, Kuch sehatmand snack ke ideas kya hain?
ChatInterface_initialMessages_health: Hi! Main aapka Healthcare assistant hoon. Main aaj aapki kaise madad kar sakti hoon?
ChatInterface_initialMessages_emotionalW: Hello, Main yahan aapki jazbati behtari ke liye hoon. Aapke zehen mein kya hai?
ChatInterface_initialMessages_nutrition: Hey! Main aapka Diet guide hoon. Sehatmand khane ke baray mein kuch bhi poochein!
ChatInterface_errorMessage: Maaf kijiyega, kuch ghalat ho gaya. Barah-e-karam baad mein dobara koshish karein.

DietPage.title: Ghiza AI
DietPage.description: Ghizaiyat aur sehatmand khane ke liye aapka zaati rehnuma.

logMeal.title: Khana Log Karein
logMeal.description: Aap ne kya khaya, usay bayan karein, aur hamara AI ghizai ajza ka andaza lagaye ga.
logMeal.mealDescriptionPlaceholder: Maslan, blueberry aur badam ke sath daliya ka ek pyala

mealHistory.title: Khane ki History
mealHistory.noHistory: Aap ne abhi tak koi khana log nahi kiya. Shuru karne ke liye upar ek shamil karein!

aiChat.title: Apne Diet Guide se Poochein
aiChat.description: Ghizaiyat ke baray mein sawalat hain? Neechay apne AI assistant se poochein.

logSuccess.title: Khana Log Hogaya!
logSuccess.description: Aapka khana aur uski ghizai maloomat save ho gayi hain.

logError.title: Tajzia Nakam
logError.description: Hum is waqt aapke khane ka tajzia nahi kar sake. Barah-e-karam dobara koshish karein.

EmotionalHealthPage.title: Jazbati Sehat AI
EmotionalHealthPage.description: Mindfulness aur jazbati tawazun ke liye aapka zaati rehnuma.

HealthcarePage.title: Healthcare AI
HealthcarePage.description: Jismani sehat aur tandrusti ke liye aapka zaati rehnuma.

PeriodTrackerPage.title: Cycle Tracker
PeriodTrackerPage.description: Apne jism ko behtar samajhne ke liye apne mahwari cycle ko track karein.

start.title: Naya Period Shuru Karein?
start.description: Yeh {date} ko ek naya period cycle shuru kar dega. Kya aap jari rakhna chahti hain?

end.title: Mojooda Period Khatam Karein?
end.description: Kya aap {date} ko apne mojooda period ka ekhtetam mark karna chahti hain?

logFlowDialog.title: Rozana Tafseelat Log Karein
logFlowDialog.description: {date} ke liye apna flow record karein

notes.label: Notes
notes.placeholder: Alamat, mood, ya kuch aur shamil karein...

logError.title: Log save karne mein nakami
logError.description: Barah-e-karam apna connection check karein aur dobara koshish karein.

logSuccess.title: Period Log Ho Gaya
logSuccess.description: Aapka naya cycle kamyabi se record ho gaya hai.

toast.endSuccessDescription: Aapka period khatam mark kar diya gaya hai.

logError.title: Oh No!
logError.description: Aapka cycle data save nahi ho saka. Barah-e-karam dobara koshish karein.

deleteSuccess.title: Entry Delete Ho Gayi
deleteSuccess.description: Cycle ki entry hata di gayi hai.

deleteError.title: Delete Nakam
deleteError.description: Cycle ki entry delete nahi ho saki. Barah-e-karam dobara koshish karein.

endDateError.title: Ghalat End Date
endDateError.description: End date start date se pehle nahi ho sakti.

bleedingHistory.title: Cycle ki History
bleedingHistory.noHistory: Abhi tak koi mukammal cycle nahi. Shuru karne ke liye apna pehla period log karein!
bleedingHistory.noNotes: Is cycle ke liye koi notes nahi.
